item.title: The Economist in the Server Room
item.description:
Many AI consultants offer theory. I offer production-grade reality.

With a Master of Science in Economics, I view every algorithm through the lens of marginal utility and ROI. As Head of Data Science at Vodafone, I navigate the complexities of legacy IT, governance, and organizational politics daily.

I don’t sell software. I sell clarity. My goal is to help German Mittelstand and Enterprise companies turn ‘AI Initiatives’ into profitable business processes.
